feels.name: Love
feels.quote: I have always loved her better than any one else, and that I shall never love any one as I love her.

feels.name: Hope
feels.quote: I shall be the most miserable devil in the world if I lose all hope of Mary.

feels.name: Pride
feels.quote: You must have a pride in your own work and in learning to do it well.

feels.name: Fondness
feels.quote: The young ones have always a claim on the old to help them forward.

feels.name: Love
feels.quote: The children are fond of each otherâ€”I mean, Fred and Mary.

Events.name: Fred Vincy's uncertainty about his future career
